long_description: The Therm-a-Rest NeoAir(TM) Camper sleeping pad offers 3 in. of soft cushioning support so you can get a good night's sleep on wilderness adventures. Tough 75-denier polyester bottom and rugged construction make it the most durable, puncture-resistant NeoAir pad yet. Internal structure contours to your body and provides great stability and warmth without the weight or bulk of conventional insulation. Woven fabrics and stretch materials create a soft mattress that cushions you from the hard ground. Therm-a-Rest NeoAir(TM) Camper sleeping pad includes a stuff sack and repair kit.
short_description: The Therm-a-Rest NeoAir(TM) Camper sleeping pad offers 3 in. of soft cushioning support so you can get a good night's sleep on wilderness adventures.
